reference.title: Glossary of Terms for the Synology WRX560
reference.shortdesc: Here are some helpful terms to know if you're installing, replacing, or troubleshooting your Synology WRX560!

dlentry.dd: The physical or tangible part of tech, like routers, modems and cables
The digital or intangible part of tech, like websites and computer programs
Hardware that connects and manages networks to provide an Internet connection
Hardware that converts signals between your internet service and your devices to maintain a stable connection
Hardware that supplies devices with the correct type of electrical power
Hardware that physically connects devices to enable communication between them
Small colored lights on a router that show the device's current operating status
Openings on a router used for connecting cables and other hardware
The frequency range used by your Wi-Fi router, affecting speed, range, and susceptibility to interference
